title: Kevin Durant, NY Giants, Manny Machado, and the Lakers
itunes:title: Kevin Durant, NY Giants, Manny Machado, and the Lakers
description:
Colin discusses the trolling the NBA did last night, why Golden State Warriors F Kevin Durant won his divorce with Oklahoma City Thunder PG Russell Westbrook, why the problems of the New York Giants is the fault of owner John Mara, why he enjoys watching Manny Machado, and why the Los Angeles Lakers will be fine if they don't get Kawhi Leonard or Jimmy Butler. Guests include Nick Wright Stephen Jackson, Joel Klatt, Jason Whitlock, and Tom Verducci.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
